survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Wellness Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with digital wellness programs offered by the company, including mental health apps, fitness trackers, and online wellness resources.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the digital wellness programs offered by your company?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure familiarity levels. Ensure options are clearly distinguishable.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the digital wellness programs offered by your company?

questions.question_text: Which digital wellness programs have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an option for non-users.

script.question_text: Which digital wellness programs have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital wellness programs provided by your company?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option other than 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction. Ensure the question is skipped if no programs were used.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Routing logic: Display only if Q2 != 'None of the above'.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital wellness programs provided by your company?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option other than 'None of the above' in Q2

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the company's digital wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Keep the text box large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the company's digital wellness programs?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's digital wellness programs to a colleague?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option other than 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure likelihood. Skip if no programs were used.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Routing logic: Display only if Q2 != 'None of the above'.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's digital wellness programs to a colleague?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option other than 'None of the above' in Q2
